pageProduct.name: Ponds Vitamin Detoxing Charcoal Micellar Water 400ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

The first charcoal vitamin micellar water; formulated with a refreshing cocktail of micellar water, 5 essential vitamins (vitamins A, B3, B5, C, and E), and activated charcoal and bamboo charcoal; deep cleans to remove up to 99 percent makeup, dirt, impurities, and sunscreen; purifies pores from pollution, pigments, and debris

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes

Common Uses

Makeup Removal, Skin impurities, Oil Removal

Ingredients

Water, Hexylene Glycol, Glycerin, Panthenol, Niacinamide, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Charcoal Powder, Retinyl Propionate, Hydroxyethyl Urea, Ammonium Lactate, Urea, PEG-6 Caprylic/Capric Glycerides, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Chloride, Potassium Chloride, Citric Acid, Ethanolamine, Tetrasodium EDTA, Cetrimonium Chloride, Cetylpyridinium Chloride, Benzophenone-4, Trideceth-9, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, BHT, Sodium Sulfate, Phenoxyethanol, CI 17200, CI 19140, CI 61570

Directions

Pour micellar water into a cotton pad. Gently swipe onto skin to remove makeup and dirt on your face, eyes, lips, and neck. No rinsing required.
